name: Summer Sports Jump
description:
Do you want a fun, endless running game summer sports game?
Summer Sports Jump is here to test your skills and agility whenever you want. With you will have the unique opportunity to improve and test your reflexes in a unique and fun Summer Sports world.
The task is simple, as you play Summer Sports Jump you will need to do all you can in order to jump from one platform to another
All you need to do is click on the screen to jump.
